title: King of the Sierras 1938 (American western) directed by Samuel Diege and Arthur Rosson

sources.title: King of the Sierras 1938 (American western) directed by Samuel Diege and Arthur Rosson
sources.description:
A Clash of Cultures, a Symphony of Mustangs: Witness the Untold Story of the Sierras!
"King of Sierras" delves into the heart of the Wild West, where ranchers confront the challenges of survival amidst the majestic but perilous landscape. With wild mustangs roaming the range and tensions escalating, the film unfolds a gripping saga of courage, betrayal, and the enduring spirit of the frontier.

Original title: King of the Sierras (1938) AKA Killers of the Prairie /Black Stallion


Black & White version: https://youtu.be/FrWoGkEF0Qo

Directors: Samuel Diege, Arthur Rosson
Writers: Scott Darling, Paul Franklin, Frank Gay
Actors: Rex, Hobart Bosworth, Harry Harvey Jr.
Genres: Colorized, Western, Drama


00:00 Full movie (with subtitles).
02:48 Ranchers discuss wild horses and their families, feeling conflicted about driving them off for sale.
09:27 Cowboys in Cactus Valley sing about their desire for a cowboy's life and home.
14:18 A man named Tommy allows his horse, Whitey, to have a holiday and run freely near the gate.
20:19 Bond between a father and son horse, teaching and protecting, finding safety and contentment.
38:09 Conflict between Whitey and Diablo resolved by a courageous colt.


@CultCinemaClassics
